posts.title: The Cube Assassin Crosses Realms in the December Fortnite Crew Pack
posts.content:
Fortnite Crew Benefits:

  • December Crew Pack

  • Fortnite Crew Legacy Set (leaving soon)

  • Next Season‚Äôs (and this Season‚Äôs) Battle Pass

  • 1,000 V-Bucks Every Month

  • November Crew Pack (available until November 30 at 7 PM ET)
     


There‚Äôs a good chance you fought her countless times in Chapter 2 Season 8‚Äôs Sideways. Whether or not you finally defeated her, it‚Äôs almost time for you to get the last laugh. Battle as the Cube Assassin herself.

The Cube Assassin breaks out of The Sideways in the December 2021 Crew Pack, going live for active Fortnite Crew subscribers at approximately 7 PM ET on November 30.

The Cube Assassin as a Chapter 2 Season 8 boss encounter.


Embrace Cubism with the December Crew Pack

In assassin fashion, the Cube Assassin comes with accessories. In addition to her (reactive!) Outfit, the December Crew Pack includes the intricate The Cubist Back Bling, the cube-composed Cube Edge Pickaxe, and the glyphic Assassin's Mark Wrap.

How‚Äôs the Cube Assassin Outfit reactive? The more eliminations you get in a match, the more its purple pulse spreads across it. You can turn off this effect by selecting the Outfit‚Äôs alt Style. 


More Fortnite Crew Benefits: Legacy Set, Next Season‚Äôs Battle Pass, Monthly V-Bucks, and the Nov. Crew Pack!


Leaving Soon: Fortnite Crew Legacy Set

As previously announced, players have until December 31, 2021, at 7 PM ET to unlock the Protocol Pack Back Bling. This Back Bling is part of the Fortnite Crew Legacy Set. For every month you‚Äôre an active Fortnite Crew subscriber, you‚Äôll unlock a new Stage in the Set for up to six total Stages. The Stages unlock on the 14th of each month during your subscription (at 8 PM EDT / 7 PM EST).

Stage 1 unlocks upon subscribing to Fortnite Crew. The Set includes the Back Bling, which gets a new Style with Stages 2 and 3 ‚Äî then a Pickaxe that unlocks at Stage 3 and gets a new Style with Stages 4, 5, and 6. 


Next Season‚Äôs (and this Season‚Äôs) Battle Pass

Fortnite Crew subscribers always have instant access to the current Season‚Äôs Battle Pass. Even though Chapter 2 Season 8 is almost over, players who subscribe before the Season ends will still get its Battle Pass ‚Äî so they can unlock its rewards if they haven‚Äôt already.

If you'd already bought the Chapter 2 Season 8 Battle Pass before subscribing during the Season, a one-time 950 V-Bucks return will be applied to your account.



After Chapter 2 Season 8 ends, active subscribers during the next Season will get that Season‚Äôs Battle Pass.


1,000 V-Bucks Every Month

Active Fortnite Crew subscribers receive 1,000 V-Bucks every month! These V-Bucks are received on the day of subscribers‚Äô billing date*. Signed up on November 23, 2021? You‚Äôll be granted 1,000 V-Bucks upon sign-up, then while subscribed, 1,000 V-Bucks on December 23, 2021, on January 23, 2022, and so on.

Remember: Because you receive these V-Bucks on the day of your billing date, they aren‚Äôt attached to when you receive the monthly Crew Pack.


November Crew Pack: The Final First Shadow

November saw the entrance of Sierra, the third and final ‚ÄúFirst Shadow.‚Äù Interested in the Outfit but haven't obtained it yet? No worries. The November Crew Pack ‚Äî featuring Sierra ‚Äî is available until November 30 at 7 PM ET (when players begin to receive December‚Äôs Crew Pack). 



Sierra still holds her own despite being part of The First Shadows. As well as the Sierra Outfit, November‚Äôs Crew Pack contains the well-stocked Sierra‚Äôs Go Bag Back Bling, the Serrated Steelblades Pickaxe, Glowing Vengeance Wrap, and Sierra‚Äôs Vengeance Loading Screen.

As an extra, Fortnite Crew subscribers who‚Äôve assembled all three of The First Shadows (The Burning Wolf, Chaos Origins, and Sierra) will receive a bonus Style for each Outfit.


 


Signing up to Fortnite Crew is available in-game from either the Item Shop or Battle Pass tab. For more details on the subscription, check out our Fortnite Crew FAQ!
 
Important: To claim the December Crew Pack, you may need to log in from your original purchasing platform if it has been more than 30 days since your last login from that platform. 
 
*Recurring $11.99 (or local pricing) subscription fee charged monthly until cancelled. You can cancel anytime. See Subscription Terms for complete details, including how to cancel.
posts.description: December‚Äôs Fortnite Crew benefits include the Cube Assassin Outfit and more items in the Crew Pack, plus 1,000 V-Bucks and the Battle Pass.
posts.author: The Fortnite Team

posts.title: Fortnite Battle Royale v18.40 - Nov 23 Hotfix: Item Vote + Strike from the Shadows Week
posts.content:
It's almost time to employ a new fighting strategy in the war against the Cubes. But before that, it's time now to decide the next item to bring into the war...


War Effort: Proximity Grenade Launcher vs. Flint-Knock Pistol



The war effort‚Äôs again taking a look back at the classics ‚Äî putting forth two unconventional weapons for Loopers‚Äô consideration. With the Proximity Grenade Launcher, launch grenades that go off by just being near someone. Or with the Flint-Knock Pistol, go flying back for extra evasiveness (and mobility) when you shoot it. 

Help the war effort decide which one to bring into the fight against the Cubes. The first to reach 100% Funded from Donation Stations will be swiftly manufactured for the Island. Contribute Bars at Donation Stations for your favorite choice! 


Strike from the Shadows Week



The best ninjas know the importance of stealth. It‚Äôs one thing to throw a Paper Bomb Kunai at an opponent, but it‚Äôs another to approach in shadow form first. True, you can‚Äôt use weapons in shadow form ‚Äî and the Kunai is no exception ‚Äî but why blow your cover before you‚Äôre within striking distance? 

In Strike from the Shadows Week, running from 9 AM ET on November 23 to 9 AM ET on November 30, Paper Bomb Kunai and Shadow Stones are all over the place! You can catch Shadow Floppers in greater numbers too... and even find them on land. Turn into a shadow with the Stones and Floppers, then strike with the Kunai. Also complete themed Quests in the Strike from the Shadows Punchcard!
 


Competitive notes:

  • The Strike from the Shadows Week changes will not be included in competitive playlists.
posts.description: The Nov 23 hotfix for Fortnite Battle Royale includes the next war effort item vote and the Strike from the Shadows Week, which runs Nov 23 through Nov 30!
posts.author: The Fortnite Team

posts.title: Light Up The Night With The Fortnite Tech Future Pack
posts.content:
Flipswitch your nano-decks and plug in -- the Tech Future Pack has arrived in Fortnite!


Fortnite classics Peely, Lynx, and 8-Ball get transformed with a new cyber-enhanced and neon-laced look as P33LY, NeuraLynx, and CRZ-8. Each Outfit is also equipped with a high tech Pickaxe and Back Bling to match.

Available now as a pack in the Fortnite Item Shop, the Tech Future Pack comes overclocked with all three Outfits, Back Blings, and Pickaxes for one bundle price. Pick it up today, the future has never looked so stylish.
posts.description: Fortnite classics Peely, Lynx, and 8-Ball get transformed with a new cyber-enhanced and neon-laced look as P33LY, NeuraLynx, and CRZ-8. For purchase in the Item Shop!
posts.author: The Fortnite Team

posts.title: High Altitude Meets High Fashion in Fortnite with the Moncler Classic Set
posts.content:
For those who don‚Äôt shy away from new heights. For those who aren‚Äôt afraid of the climb.

As you‚Äôre ascending the mountain near Catty Corner, building a tower, or elevating another way, watch your fashion transform as you go up ‚Äî and also come back down. A new form of self-expression enters Fortnite with the Moncler Classic Set, based on the summit-centric spirit of fashion label Moncler and available in the Item Shop starting November 20 at 7 PM ET. 


The Moncler Classic Set Catalogue


Outfits

The Moncler Classic Set includes the Andre and Renee Outfits. Inspired by the 6 Moncler 1017 Alyx 9SM collection by Matthew Williams, these Outfits celebrate light and dark. If you choose their reactive base Style, watch your attire transition from light to dark as your altitude gets higher. As your altitude gets lower, your attire will transition from dark back to light!


Accessories

If you‚Äôre looking for some gear for your climb, the Moncler Classic Set also includes the:

  • Umbra-tube Back Bling - The classic brolly, elevated.

  • Umbra-Axe Pickaxe - A sleet-sharpened slicing machine.

  • Para-Pluie Glider - An umbrella, but in French.
     


Loading Screen

The Moncler Classic Bundle includes the Andre and Renee Outfits, and the Moncler Classic Gear Bundle includes the Back Bling, Pickaxe, and Glider. The Moncler Classic Bundle additionally contains The Summit Loading Screen:

The view is worth the climb.


Mark your altitude with altering appearance.
posts.description: Gear up for winter in Fortnite with the Moncler Classic Set! Includes reactive Outfits, a Back Bling, Pickaxe, Glider, and more. Buy individually or as bundles.
posts.author: The Fortnite Team

posts.title: Unlock Free Radiohead Items in Fortnite based on the KID A MNESIA EXHIBITION Experience
posts.content:
In celebration of the KID A MNESIA EXHIBITION, presented by Radiohead & Epic Games and developed by [namethemachine] & Arbitrarily Good Productions, Fortnite players are able to unlock in-game items based on the experience. 

KID A MNESIA EXHIBITION is an ‚Äúupside-down‚Äù digital/analogue universe created from original Radiohead artwork and recordings to commemorate 21 years of their Kid A and Amnesiac albums. The experience is available to download for free on PC and PlayStation 5.


Free Radiohead Lobby Track and Loading Screen

Players who download KID A MNESIA EXHIBITION on PC or PlayStation 5 will receive the Radiohead Lobby Track in their Fortnite Locker. This track is ‚ÄúUntitled v1‚Äù from the band‚Äôs anniversary triple album release of the same name, Kid A Mnesia.

Note: If you‚Äôre downloading KID A MNESIA EXHIBITION on PlayStation 5, make sure your PlayStation account is linked to your Epic account to receive the Radiohead Lobby Track. After downloading the exhibition on PlayStation 5, you must log into Fortnite on your PlayStation 5 to receive the Lobby Track. 



Also, from November 18 at 7 PM ET to November 22 at 7 PM ET on all platforms, the land of freedom Loading Screen will be available for free in the Fortnite Item Shop. This special Loading Screen is based on the iconic cover art of the Kid A album.



We hope you enjoy the immersive visual and musical world of KID A MNESIA EXHIBITION.
posts.description: Radiohead and Epic Games present KID A MNESIA EXHIBITION! Download for PC or PlayStation 5 and unlock a free Radiohead Lobby Track. Also unlock a free Radiohead Loading Screen in the Item Shop.
posts.author: The Fortnite Team

posts.title: Earn Fortnite Items Completing The Nindo Challenges!
posts.content:
A Nindo (Ninja Way) is a personal rule or promise to oneself that each Shinobi lives by. 

In NARUTO SHIPPUDEN you will often hear Naruto Uzumaki state:

‚ÄúI‚Äôm not going to run away! I never go back on my word! That‚Äôs my Nindo: my Ninja way!‚Äù

Naruto overcame great obstacles by following his Nindo. Now, we are presenting you with a series of challenges - will you run away, or will you channel Naruto‚Äôs Nindo and walk away with in-game rewards (maybe even your very own Kurama Glider, the great and powerful nine-tailed beast!)

Starting at 04:00 AM ET on November 17 until 11:59 PM ET on November 21, players have the opportunity to complete The Nindo challenges to earn in-game rewards!  

How to Get Started

Ready to walk the path of the Ninja? Visit The Nindo website now and sign up by following the prompts to register with your Epic Games account.
Once signed up and logged in, you‚Äôll be presented with your first challenge! Naruto, Sasuke, Sakura, and Kakashi will each challenge you during one of the event‚Äôs four days. Successfully complete the daily challenges to earn in-game rewards.


The Nindo Rewards 

In the Naruto tv-series successfully completing missions for the village is always rewarded, and Fortnite‚Äôs Nindo Challenges are no different. 

Here is a look at the awesome rewards you could be claiming:

Naruto Uzumaki Emoticon - Art by Studio Peirrot

Sasuke Uchiha Emoticon - Art by Studio Pierrot

Sakura Haruno Emoticon - Art by Studio Pierrot

Kakashi Hatake Emoticon - Art by Studio Pierrot


The rewards don‚Äôt stop here. Achieve the Daily Milestone to earn the Kurama Glider and the Shinobi Teamwork Loading Screen.

Here is the Kurama Glider that could take you flying down to a Victory Royale:

A fearsome nine-tailed beast sealed inside Naruto Uzumaki. 


And here is the Shinobi Teamwork Loading Screen:

Work together to protect your friends. Art by Studio Pierrot.
 

If you miss a day of Nindo challenges there is no need to panic, a good ninja squad always has one another‚Äôs back and we have yours. Earn at least two points on day 5 to receive all of the daily challenge emoticon rewards listed above that you have not yet earned!
Check your progress and find out more anytime on The Nindo website! 
For full details and requirements, please read the official The Nindo Terms of Participation.

*Please note that the Kurama Glider is also available in the Item Shop for you to purchase.
posts.description: Naruto Shippuden is bringing The Nindo Challenges to Fortnite! Follow Naruto Uzumaki‚Äôs ninja way and complete the challenges to earn Naruto in-game themed Items such as Emotes, a Glider and Loading Screen.
posts.author: The Fortnite Team

posts.title: Naruto X Fortnite is Finally Here
posts.content:
‚ÄúI never go back on my word. That‚Äôs my nindo, my ninja way!‚Äù - Naruto Uzumaki

Straight from the mind of Masashi Kishimoto, the much-loved characters of the anime series ‚ÄòNARUTO SHIPPUDEN‚Äô arrive in Fortnite!

The wait is over 

Naruto Uzumaki, the number one most unpredictable ninja and Jinchuriki host of the all-powerful nine-tailed beast is ready ‚Äî along with the rest of Team 7 ‚Äî to take you through to a Victory Royale! 

Accompanying Naruto, the other members of Team 7:  
 
Sasuke Uchiha: Experienced with the impressive visual Jutsu of the Sharingan and one of the last surviving members of the Uchiha clan.

Sakura Haruno: Doe-eyed for Sasuke, she has taken her fiery inner-voice, deft control of chakra, and extreme strength to become one of the greatest Kunoichi.

Kakashi Hatake: Known as The Copy Ninja for his deft skill in copying almost any Jutsu he sees in the Shinobi world using his second-hand Sharingan.

Always wanted to channel your inner Ninja and play as a member of Team 7? How about dropping onto the Island on the back of Kurama, the Nine-Tailed Beast? 

Well, now is your chance! Teleporting their way into the Item Shop are: 

Naruto Outfits 

  • Naruto Uzumaki (with Seventh Hokage variant Style): Believe it!

  • Sasuke Uchiha (with the Snake Sword Pickaxe): My only goal is in the darkness.

  • Sakura Haruno (with Sakura Uchiha variant Style): We have to be strong. You and me together.

  • Kakashi Hatake (with Black Ops Kakashi variant Style): I'll protect you with my life. All of you.

Naruto Back Bling

  • Pakkun Back Bling: Kakashi's smallest ninken.

  • Demon Wind Shuriken Back Bling: A shuriken with fearsome curved blades.

  • Hidden Leaf Cloak Back Bling: A warm cloak fit for going on missions.

  • Scroll Back Bling: Contains Techniques



 

Naruto Pickaxes

  • Black Ops Sword Pickaxe: A sword used by the black ops.

  • Kunai Pickaxe (with Black variant Style): A sharp weapon favored by the shinobi. 

  • Snake Sword: Sasuke's beloved sword.

  • Hidan's Scythe: The scythe of choice for curse rituals.



 

Naruto Glider and Emotes 

  • Kurama Glider: A fearsome nine-tailed beast sealed inside Naruto Uzumaki. (Comes with the Shinobi Teamwork Loading Screen) 

  • Summoning Jutsu Emote: Did you remember to form your contract?

  • Ramen Break Emote: Treat yourself to a lil' shinobi snack.

 

The Kurama Glider:


 

And the Shinobi Teamwork Loading Screen - Work together to protect your friends. Art by Studio Pierrot.

 
 

Players will have the opportunity to pick up some of these items in bundles. 
 

The Naruto & Kakashi Bundle: includes Naruto Uzumaki Outfit (with Seventh Hokage variant Style), Scroll Back Bling, Kakashi Hatake (with Black Ops Kakashi variant Style), Pakkun Back Bling, and the Pizza Eating Jutsu Loading Screen

 
Perfecting the art of pizza eating requires disciple. Art by Studio Pierrot.
 

The Sasuke & Sakura Bundle: Includes Sasuke Uchiha (with the Sword of Kusanagi Pickaxe), Demon Wind Shuriken Back Bling, Snake Sword Pickaxe, Sakura Haruno (with Sakura Uchiha variant Style), Hidden Leaf Cloak Back Bling, and the Team 7 Loading Screen

 
Ready for an A-rank mission.
 

The Shinobi Gear Bundle: includes Ramen Break Emote, Summoning Jutsu Emote, Kunai Pickaxe, Black Ops Sword Pickaxe and Hidan‚Äôs Scythe Pickaxe. 


  

The fun with Naruto doesn‚Äôt stop here! Be authentic with the Paper Bomb Kunai, wander around the Hidden Leaf village, meet Kakashi, make your own mini Team 7, and challenge yourself in The Nindo Community Battle!

 

Complete Kakashi's Missions To Earn Rewards

The glue that holds Naruto, Sakura, and Sasuke together, the Copy Ninja himself Kakashi Hatake has covertly placed himself on the Island ready to set you up with ninja-themed Quests. Don't worry if you're unable to approach him right away. He'll be around for the whole rest of the Season!

 

Paper Bomb Kunai

If you want to be a splendid Shinobi you need the right ninja tools. Until the end of the Season, you will be able to find Paper Bomb Kunai in the game as a new weapon to throw at your opponents. 
Visit Kakashi to get your hands on this formidable weapon or find them in Chests and Loot Llamas. 


 

Visit the Hidden Leaf Village

You are invited to explore Konohagakure, the Hidden Leaf village!  

Visit iconic locations such as the Hokage Residences, and Ichiraku in the Naruto Featured Hub. When you're ready to explore more, find Naruto in front of the Hokage residence who will guide you to the Hidden Leaf Village Adventure Map.  
The Hidden Leaf Village Adventure Map will fully immerse you in the Naruto universe, giving you the chance to fulfill your ninja fantasy and walk in the shoes of a Hidden Leaf resident. Complete quests to unlock even more breathtaking iconic locations such as the Final Valley and the Chunin Exam arena.


 

To enter the Naruto-themed Creative Hub, select the ‚ÄúCreative‚Äù tile in the Discovery tab. To enter the Hidden Leaf Village Adventure Map, select the ‚ÄúHidden Leaf Village Adventure‚Äù tile in the Discovery tab. 
The Naruto-themed Creative Hub will be available from 10 AM ET November 16 to 10 AM ET November 23 and the Hidden Leaf Village Adventure Map will be available from 10 AM ET November 16 until 10 AM ET November 29! Created By Vysena Studios


Papercraft: Build your own Team 7!

Get creative and make your own Team 7. Visit fortnite.com/cosplay to learn how to make your very own mini Naruto character! Downloadable instructions are available so you can make your own Naruto, Sasuke, Sakura, or Kakashi! 

 
 

The Nindo Community Battle


Stay tuned for a future announcement providing you the opportunity to earn in-game content, including the Kurama Glider! 

‚ìí2002 MASASHI KISHIMOTO / 2007 SHIPPUDEN All Rights Reserved.
posts.description: Naruto arrives in Fortnite! Naruto Uzumaki, Sasuke Uchiha, Sakura Haruno, and Kakashi Hatake Outfits and other Items are available in the Item Shop.
posts.author: The Fortnite Team

posts.title: Fortnite Battle Royale v18.40 Update: Meet The Salvaged B.R.U.T.E.
posts.content:
Update 18.40 is here and the Island is destabilizing, two classic vehicles return, and Naruto Uzumaki and the rest of Team 7 arrive!   
 

War Effort: The Salvaged B.R.U.T.E.



The Cube Queen has deployed countless warriors, and corruption is spreading fast throughout the Island. To fight back, the war effort against the Cubes is producing some big guns of their own. 

Meet the Salvaged B.R.U.T.E. Battling the Sideways has left the war effort short on supplies, meaning this Salvaged B.R.U.T.E. has a stripped down armor hull with no overshield, making it easier for clever opponents to counter and dismantle. However, it comes battle-ready with combat effectiveness tailored for taking on wave after wave of Cube Monsters.

Of course, Salvaged B.R.U.T.E. Stations need Bars to get off the ground‚Ä¶ lots of Bars. Stations have been deployed across the Island where you can place funds. Once they‚Äôre fully funded, they‚Äôll drop in Salvaged B.R.U.T.E.s available to Loopers in their matches.

Help boot up the Salvaged B.R.U.T.E. and beat back The Cube Queen‚Äôs endless army.
 

Naruto & Team 7 in Fortnite

From the beloved anime series NARUTO SHIPPUDEN, Naruto Uzumaki and the rest of Team 7 have finally arrived in Fortnite! Their Outfits (as well as other items) are in the Item Shop starting now, and Team 7 member Kakashi Hatake, in addition to an Outfit, has covertly placed himself as an Island Character. Find him and he‚Äôll set you up with ninja-themed Quests.



Also, until the end of the Season, you‚Äôll be able to find Paper Bomb Kunai as a new weapon to throw at opponents. Find this explosive weapon in Chests or Loot Llamas ‚Äî or exchange Bars with Kakashi Hatake for some.



For more info on the Team 7 activities, visit our Naruto & Team 7 blog post!

Shopping Carts Roll Out



Clean up on Aisle 3 ‚Äî Shopping Carts have returned to the Island! Throw a friend in the basket and scoot around with this classic ‚Äúvehicle,‚Äù found at shopping and residential areas like Retail Row and Holly Hedges.


The Convergence Expands

The Cube Queen continues to corrupt the Island as The Convergence takes on a new shape. Drop in and pay tribute.  
 

XP from Accolades in Creative

In creator-made maps that utilize the new Accolade Device, players will be able to earn XP towards their Battle Pass progress via Accolades set by the creator. The device is available now to all creators.

If you‚Äôre a creator who wants more information, check out our v18.40 Creative Update post. 

____________________________________________________________________________

Major Bug Fixes

  • Grapplers have returned to Team Rumble and Battle Lab.
  • Collection book entries can now be viewed when using Performance Mode.
  • Cars will no longer vanish or move when entering or exiting.


____________________________________________________________________________

Competitive Note:

  • Shopping Carts, the Salvaged B.R.U.T.E., and Paper Bomb Kunai are not present in competitive playlists.
posts.description: The Fortnite Battle Royale v18.40 Update is packed! The Salvaged B.R.U.T.E., Naruto and Team 7, Shopping Carts return and more!
posts.author: The Fortnite Team

posts.title: Fortnite Creative v18.40 Update: new accolade device and matchmaking changes
posts.content:
The v18.40 update brings several device updates, new front end changes, matchmaking changes, and the new Accolade device!

Front-end Changes

New: Loading Screen Information

Another new change in 18.40 is to the loading screen, where the Creator name, Island name and the 3 information bullet points specified in the My Island settings will be displayed while a player is loading into an experience.  This is an opportunity to give players important information about your experience before they get there, so think carefully about what you want those information bullets to say to get maximum value out of them.

Update: Matchmaking Portal Change

Matchmaking Portals will now require the Creator to use the version number when linking to an island code of an island that has not gone through the Creator Submission process.  The portals will work as they do now if the submitted island has been approved by that process. The matchmaking portal will allow players to enter the latest approved version of that island code.  

This prevents islands that have been reviewed to link to unreviewed islands. If the version number is not entered and the island code has not yet been reviewed an error message will be displayed.

New: Accolade Device 

The Accolade device allows creators to design achievements or accomplishments that players can complete to earn Battle Pass XP while playing your map! Creators will have several customization options to best fit the design of your experience, including Accolade Name, Accolade Type, Target Value, and Triggers.

For the Accolade device to be active in your experience, it will need to go through calibration. Calibration is a process of measuring data for a newly released or recently updated game, to ensure the Accolade device provides the correct amount of Battle Pass XP.  

  • When a game is newly released or updated, there is an Initial Calibration period where data is being gathered before the system decides that there is sufficient data to drive the mechanics of the Accolade Device.
  • Initial Calibration comes in 2 phases:
    • Data Gathering
    • Data Analysis
  • During the Initial Calibration period, players can only earn Playtime XP in your map.
    • The system still keeps track of enabled Accolades being triggered.
    • Playtime XP is defined by Epic and is not related to the Playtime Accolades made available to Creators.
    • Playtime XP will be disabled after initial calibration is over

Because the Calibration process needs to gather data, the length of the Initial Calibration period is dependent on the amount of engagement that a map gets during that period, so will vary from map to map.

We‚Äôll notify Creators through email whenever there is a key event in the game‚Äôs calibration. These key events include:

  • Start of Initial Calibration 
  • Initial Calibration Warning
  • Initial Calibration Passed 
  • Initial Calibration Failed
  • Post Calibration Failure

For further details on the Accolade Device visit the Fortnite Creative Documentation website. In addition to the Creative Documentation, we hosted a Q&A in our Fortnite Creative Discord that you can view answers to questions other creators had.

New: Item Remover Device

This device allows you to remove items directly from a player‚Äôs inventory without using Checkpoints or Capture Areas. 

You can choose the type and amount of items to remove and even add specific items to the device for precise control of what to remove.  You can even force items to drop on the ground and affect all players in a team or class simultaneously.

For more information on the Item Remover Device visit our Fortnite Creative Documentation Site 

Update: Timer Device

  • We‚Äôve now moved the persistence features of the Timer device out of beta and into full release so you can now pause, resume and continue timers between sessions for your players.

Update: Shooting Gallery Device

The shooting gallery gets a whole lot of love in this update.  We‚Äôve added full channel control, timers, randomizers and a bunch of other customization options to let you build the ultimate target shoot arena.

Battle Royale Items 

We‚Äôve added the following Battle Royal items to Creative

  • Shockwave Grenade Launcher
  • Branch AR (Combat Assault Rifle)
  • Tactical Pistol
  • Sideways Scythe (goes from blue up)
  • Zero Point Pretzel

Device Fixes

  • Fixed an issue with the Skydome device that caused it not to generate clouds when the game language is set to anything other than English.
  • Fixed an issue with the Skydome device Fog Colour that affected the Time of Day setting.
  • Fixed a visual issue when the Skydome device was set to 0% Fog. 
  • Fixed an issue with the Switch device that caused it to not work correctly when the Enabled on Game Start option was set to NO.
  • Fixed an issue with the Switch device that caused the Allowed Team setting to not work correctly.
  • Fixed an issue with the HUD message device that caused it to play an audio sound without a message.
  • Fixed an issue with the barrier device that caused players to teleport when jumping into it with props nearby. 

Prefab & Gallery Fixes

  • Fixed an issue with trees from the Holiday Gallery missing snow on the material.
  • Fixed an issue with a hay bale from Spooky Prop Gallery A dropping resource materials unlike other hay bale assets.
  • Gameplay Fixes
  • Fixed an issue that caused Creators to be unable to place traps after changing Structure Damage Settings in Creative Matchmaking.
  • Fixed an issue that caused cube vents to disappear after jumping on them.

UI Updates

  • New UI island setting: Max Trackers on HUD with values 0, 1, 2, and 3.

UI Fixes

  • Fixed an issue that caused creators using a controller to be unable to select the Clear All Player's Save Data check box when trying to publish a map.
  • Fixed an issue that caused the Conditional Button to not hide during Replay Mode.
posts.description: The Fortnite Creative v18.40 update brings several device updates, new front-end changes, matchmaking changes, and the new Accolade device!
posts.author: The Fortnite Team

posts.title: Save the World | Homebase Status Report 11.16.2021
posts.content:
Calling all Commanders,
 
There is much to be discussed in this Status Report, so let‚Äôs get right into it! Homebase Status Report - Initiate! 

Commanders are now able to earn Battle Pass experience in Save the World! 

Here‚Äôs how it works: Completing missions in Save the World will reward you with accolades that will grant you varying amounts of XP based on the badges earned during the mission. A majority of XP will come from badges earned from successfully completing a mission, but there are many ways to earn more: Looting materials, crafting weapons, defeating Husks, exploring the map; all of these are ways to earn more XP in your missions. Don‚Äôt forget to complete those bonus mission objectives!

This feature goes live on November 16 2021 at 1 PM ET.


Save the World‚Äôs Winterfest Venture Season makes its jolly return

Hexslyvania may be making its ghostly exit soon, but the chills are just getting started with the return of the Winterfest Venture Season on November 20 at 7 PM ET!

The return of Winterfest also brings the return of the Super Heroic Modifier where each class will gain super heroic benefits that will further strengthen their style of play.

Soldiers, This is the perfect modifier to enhance those headshots!  The damage of headshots is doubled and you‚Äôll benefit from reduced cooldowns when eliminating Husks with ranged weapons. Accuracy is key!

Constructors, The one downside of building is that it uses up your hard earned materials. Well that problem is reduced with this modifier! Building will cost fewer materials; on top of that, this modifier gives Kinetic Overload lower cooldown and greater impact!

Ninjas, A healthy blend of Melee and Ability weaving will be key with this modifier. Focus your efforts on ability eliminations to gain increased melee damage and attack speed. Use that to your advantage as melee eliminations also reduce your ability cooldowns.  Synergize your playstyle for maximum efficiency. You‚Äôll also gain double the Shadowstance stats so get in their faces and show em‚Äô who's boss. 

Outlanders, It‚Äôs time for some punchin‚Äô (looking at you, Jess) as Anti-Material charge will have no cost during this Ventures Season. For all you T.E.D.D.Y slingers out there,  you‚Äôll benefit from a free Fragment every 50 seconds along with increased ability damage. 

Reports from the field show that the winter winds have increased the Husk resistance to trap and weapon damage, so get ready to build a squad that can pack quite a punch! 
 


Unwrap the Holiday Llama!

This Llama looks cold on the outside, but it is filled with festive heroes and weapons that will warm up Homebase. The Holiday Llama returns on November 20 at 7 PM ET.

 

Frostnite Challenges return, Subzero Zenith Freezes up the Event Store, and Crackshot needs your help in the Holly Jolly Questline on November 20  (7 PM ET)


Survive the bitter cold in Frostnite

Beginning on November 20 at 7 PM ET,  venture out and keep the Burner filled with scavenged BluGlo. If it runs out, things get real cold real quick. As the burner health decreases the Storm Shield shrinks, so fill ‚Äòer up. 

The Krampus Smashers who dwell in these cold regions are dangerous but worth the fight, dropping some much needed BluGlo. Check your quest log for Frostnite rewards, such as the loading screen / music pack and be on the lookout for weekly challenges in the coming weeks.

Survive as long as you can with only your scavenged loot, schematics, and wits to protect you.
 


Subzero Zenith

‚ÄúLet's put them on ice‚Äù - Subzero Zenith
 
  • Standard Perk: Icy Shot
    • Sniper critical hits apply Water Affliction, dealing 21 base Water Damage per second for 3 seconds.
  • Commander Perk: Icy Shot+
    • Sniper critical hits freeze enemies for 1.6 seconds and apply Water Affliction, dealing 21 base Water Damage per second for three seconds.
  • Unlocks Team Perk: Shake it Off
    • Decreases duration of elemental status effects by 50%. Requires 2 Heroes with 4 or more stars.
 


Holly Jolly Ransom

It‚Äôs finally time for the Holidays! The tree is up and decorated. The cocoa is nice and warm. The candy canes are minty and fresh. Still‚Ä¶ It feels like we are missing something‚Ä¶.Wait a minute! Where is Homebases‚Äô most festive hero, Crackshot!? Investigating a missing nutcracker case wasn‚Äôt necessarily in the Homebase‚Äôs holidays plans, but here we are! Completing this questline will reward you with the festive Soldier hero, Crackshot.
 


Crackshot

‚ÄúWILL YOU HURRY UP AND SAVE ME ALREADY!?‚Äù - Crackshot
 
  • Standard Perk: Mad Tidings
    • Firing a ranged weapon grants 1 stack of Holiday Spirit, up to 50 stacks. Each stack of Holiday Spirit increases Ranged Weapon Damage by 1% but decreases Weapon Stability by 0.2%. Buff removed on weapon swap or reload.
  • Commander Perk: Mad Tidings+
    • Firing a ranged weapon grants 1 stack of Holiday Spirit, up to 50 stacks. Each stack of Holiday Spirit increases Ranged Weapon Damage by 2.9% but decreases Weapon Stability by 0.7%. Buff removed on weapon swap or reload.
 

Things get icy in the first week of the Frostnite Challenges and Lynx claws her way into the Event Store on November 27 (7 PM ET) 



 

Frostnite Weekly Challenge 1: Frosty Turf

Starting on November 27 at 7 PM ET, take on the Frosty Turf Frostnite Challenge. Thanks to the ice cold temperature the terrain will be slippery and trap reloads are slower.

Don‚Äôt let this challenge give you cold feet though, as completing it will grant you with the constructor that puts the ‚Äúaction‚Äù in action figure, SGT. Tank!
 


SGT. Tank Gatling

‚ÄúThe best offense is a good defense‚Äù - SGT. Tank
 
  • Standard Perk: Bouncy Shield
    • Up to 5 attacks blocked by Goin‚Äô Constructor create a sonic wave, dealing 64 base damage to enemies within 0.5 tiles
  • Commander Perk: Bouncy Shield+
    • Up to 8 attacks blocked by Goin‚Äô Constructor create a sonic wave, dealing 128 base damage to enemies within 0.5 tiles
 


Lynx

‚ÄúNever stay grounded‚Äù - Lynx
 
  • Standard Perk: Hang Time
    • Using Kunai Storm grants hover for 4 seconds. Increases Damage by 40% during hover.
  • Commander Perk: Hang Time+
    • Using Kunai Storm grants hover for 4 seconds. Increases Damage by 140% during hover.
  • Unlocks Team Perk: Bio-Energy Source
    • For Each Hero with 3  or more stars, Recover Shield equal to .25% of Energy Lost.
 


The Fortnite Lars Pack

‚ÄúLooks like the band is back together‚Äù - Lars

Lead guitarist of the legendary rock band Steel Wool (and renowned Storm Scientist) is ready to strum up some Husks! 

The Lars Pack brings a new Hero and Outfit, the Lars Storm Strummer Backbling, Lars Prop Chop Pickaxe, the Lars Challenges, and access to Save the World. These exclusive Save the World challenges will earn you 1,000 V-Bucks and 1,000 X-Ray Tickets.

The Cosmetic items of this Pack will be shared through Battle Royale, Save the World and Creative game modes. This new Pack series will have no impact on existing Founder daily login rewards or their V-Bucks earned, which is exclusive to early access Founders. These outfits may appear in the item shop in the future.

Lars may be making his grand exit soon, but reports are saying that one of Homebases‚Äô very own is looking to do more than just upgrade your Gadgets.

We will give an update on that in due time. Till then, see you at the Winterfest Commanders!
posts.description: Fortnite Save the World Update: Earn Battle Pass XP in Save the World, and Challenge yourself in Frostnite!
posts.author: The Fortnite Team

posts.title: Blazing bright through the cosmos, Dark Phoenix lands in Fortnite!
posts.content:
‚ÄúI am Fire and Life incarnate! Now and forever - I am Phoenix!‚Äù  

Jean Grey, hit by a cosmic force that transcended her into becoming Phoenix, has been manipulated into something even darker! 

Already possessing powerful telekinetic and telepathic abilities in the Marvel universe, the cosmic blast that occurred during a rescue mission set Jean Grey on an unexpected path. That path now brings Dark Phoenix to the Fortnite Island!


Available in the Item Shop now:

  • Dark Phoenix Outfit: She is fire! And life incarnate! 

  • The Phoenix Force Back Bling: Only a sliver of its infinite, cosmic power. (Comes with the Dark Phoenix Outfit)

  • Wrath of the Phoenix Loading Screen: The closer to the flame, the longer your shadow becomes. (Comes with the Dark Phoenix Outfit)

  • Rising Phoenix Emote: No longer is she the woman you once knew.



 

The Wrath of the Phoenix Loading Screen:
 

The Rising Phoenix Emote, risen into action:

Don‚Äôt let the darkness envelop you ‚Äî rise up with Dark Phoenix!
posts.description: Jean Grey, the Dark Phoenix, arrives in Fortnite. Get her Outfit, The Phoenix Force Back Bling and Rising Phoenix Emote. Buy the bundle and get the Wrath of the Phoenix Loading Screen.
posts.author: The Fortnite Team

posts.title: Fortnite Battle Royale v18.30 - November 9 Hotfix: The Combat Pistol Appears!
posts.content:
As part of the war effort, you voted with your Bars to fund the Combat Assault Rifle, a new Assault Rifle variation. Now another Combat class weapon enters the war against the Cubes. Already manufactured, the new Combat Pistol is on the Island now!


Combat Pistol: Power with a Kick



Like the Combat Assault Rifle, the Combat Pistol sports a tight bullet spread and exceptional power. This power coincides with strong recoil, so it takes a savvy yielder to fire its full potential. 

Combat Pistols can be found in Chests, on the ground, and from fishing. The standard Pistol has been vaulted as the Combat Pistol has been distributed throughout the Island. 


The Sideways Rifle Enhanced



The Sideways Rifle has seen some refinements! It now reaches its superpowered state (or ‚Äúclose to overheating‚Äù state) faster, stays there longer, and is more accurate. Pick one up and take advantage of these changes.

 


Competitive notes:
  • The Shadow Flopper has been vaulted in competitive playlists.
posts.description: The Nov. 9 hotfix for Fortnite Battle Royale introduces the Combat Pistol. Tight bullet spread and exceptional power, but keep in mind the kickback!
posts.author: The Fortnite Team

posts.title: From League of Legends and Arcane, Jinx Brings Her Aura of Anarchy to Fortnite
posts.content:
To celebrate the launch of Riot Games‚Äô upcoming animated series Arcane, League of Legends‚Äô Jinx is making her explosive debut in Fortnite. This iconic character from Riot‚Äôs team-based strategy game will be causing a commotion in the Item Shop starting November 4, 2021, at 8 PM ET. Catch her while you can and get in on the mayhem as League of Legends arrives in the Epic Games Store.


A Trail of Mayhem from Zaun to the Island

The Arcane Jinx Outfit will be in the Item Shop as well as additional items from the Arcane: League of Legends Set. Have some fun with the Jinx‚Äôs Dream Monkey Back Bling, and built from surplus Pow Pow parts, pick up the Pow Pow Crusher Pickaxe. Also, pretend Piltover‚Äôs your playground with the Playground (Instrumental) Lobby Track (from the Arcane Original Soundtrack).



Players will have the option to purchase the Outfit, Back Bling, Pickaxe, and Lobby Track in the Arcane Jinx Bundle, which additionally includes the Jinxed Spray and the Wreaking Havoc and Katchoo! Loading Screens.



The Wreaking Havoc Loading Screen:

Not feeling bored.


The Katchoo! Loading Screen:

Neatness gets jinxed.


Cause some chaos as this newest member of the Gaming Legends Series.
posts.description: Jinx from Riot Games‚Äô Arcane animated series is coming to Fortnite. Check out the Arcane: League of Legends Set in the Item Shop, available November 4, 2021.
posts.author: The Fortnite Team

posts.title: Fortnite Winter Creator Callouts 2021
posts.content:
Greetings creators,

Winter is upon us and nothing is better than sipping some hot chocolate and playing some amazing games. To celebrate, we‚Äôre doing two callouts this winter! We‚Äôre looking for your best winter-themed maps, Hubs, and games in our Winter creator callout, and awesome high-tech game experiences in our Squad Games callout. Creators can participate and submit different maps for both callouts. Each callout will have its own section in Discovery. 

Winter Creator Callout

To help you design even more amazing experiences we‚Äôve added and updated some of your favorite devices.

  • New Character Device üï∫
  • New Switch DeviceüéöÔ∏è
  • Updated Elimination Manger üéØ

When creating your experience, look to incorporate one of the following for the best chance to have your experience featured: 

  • Social games, encouraging players to make new friends and tell their own stories üí¨  
  • Party-sized experiences of all genres üéâ
  • Single-player narrative experiences... maybe a cheerful one? ‚òÉÔ∏è

Share your content on social media with the whole community using #Winterfest. Find a team to build with on our Fortnite Creative Discord using the Winterfest-Callout channel. It‚Äôs also a great place to get advice on your creations! The best submissions that meet the requirements will appear in the Winterfest Discover section.

Map picks will be finalized the week of November 30, 2021, at 4 am UTC.

High Stakes Callout

This callout is designed for creators who enjoy using the latest released Fortnite Creative tech. The experiences created for this callout do not need to be winter-themed-- we‚Äôre looking for high-stakes progressive minigames.

The Creative games we‚Äôre looking for will use the following:

Logistics:

  • Each game should contain several mini-games
  • Each mini-game should take no more than five minutes
  • Games should be 16+ players
  • Each game should give players a placement to track score

Score Keeping & Progression:

  • Players should be aware of when they are winning and know how much they have won historically. 

Round based competition:

  • Many players enter, only a few win
  • Each round has a distinct game
  • Games should have simple and clear rules

We are particularly interested in games that have:

  • Instantly understandable and extremely clear gameplay: 
    • Rules are familiar, simple, and easily communicated
  • Rising tension and drama: 
    • Stakes grow with each round. Failures are dramatic.
  • Strategic speculation: 
    • ‚ÄúWhat should I do?‚Äù ‚ÄúWhat is everyone else doing?‚Äù 
    • Players are able to observe and learn from other players attempting to complete challenges
  • Dynamic social relations: 
    • ‚ÄúShould we team up?‚Äù ‚ÄúCan I still trust you?‚Äù
    • Give players the option to collaborate, or go alone
  • Interesting and unique themes:
    • What world is the game set in?
  • High stakes
    • Large rewards for winning, huge costs for losing
  • Unique elimination mechanics
    • Players dropped into lava, sent to fight velociraptors, sent into space, etc. 

We‚Äôll be creating a section in the Discover menu to promote these high-stakes experiences. 

TAKING YOUR CREATION TO THE NEXT LEVEL

What will give you the best shot at creating a successful Creative experience? Including design features like the following will help your map stick out in a good way:

ROCK-SOLID NEW PLAYER EXPERIENCE

  • Great tutorials and onboarding so that players brand new to Fortnite could be able to jump in and understand what‚Äôs happening.
  • New players shouldn‚Äôt be overwhelmed by complex mechanics. Rather, gently lead players into deeper experiences. 

 DEEP AND INTUITIVE GAMEPLAY SYSTEM(S)

  • For example, economy systems that‚Ä¶
    • Let players interact with each other to become more powerful
    • Are easy to understand, but difficult to master
      • They could stay simple, or include things like crafting and trading

 EXCITING AND CHALLENGING PLAYER PROGRESSION 

  • Players feel rewarded for playing and improving in your game 
  • Players want to come back daily to keep working towards their goals
  • This could include mechanics like... 
    • Skill and leveling systems
    • Character unlockables and chase items (like houses, pets, or trophies)
    • Unique ways to flex your skill or prowess within your game

HOW TO PARTICIPATE 

Important: Be sure to read our Fortnite Featured Hub design guidelines before sending in your submission. 

Winterfest callout submission: Use the dropdown ‚ÄúWinterfest Callout‚Äù in the Fortnite Creative Featured Content form by November 30, 2021, 4 am UTC. 

High Stakes submission: Use the dropdown ‚ÄúHigh Tech Callout‚Äù in the Fortnite Creative Featured Content form by November 30, 2021, 4 am UTC. 

Discover Submission: Apply to appear in Discover from the Fortnite Discover Submission form.

Remember that all submissions must be original work and be sure to follow the Fortnite Creative featured content guidelines.

Due to the increase in submissions during Creator Callouts, we‚Äôll be shutting down map submissions not related to the callouts from November 1, 2021 to January 3, 2022.
posts.description: Calling all Fortnite Creators ‚Äì Winter 2021 is close at hand and we have new updates and devices. Also learn how to become a Featured experience!
posts.author: The Fortnite Team

posts.title: Fortnite Battle Royale v18.30 - November 2 Hotfix: Introducing the Icy Grappler
posts.content:
The November 2 hotfix for v18.30 shows cold feet doesn‚Äôt need to mean no confidence. With the new Icy Grappler, get cold feet to help approach enemies more courageously!


Be Evasive with the Icy Grappler

Some people like to stick the landing. Others like to stay moving after landing. If you‚Äôre the latter type, the Icy Grappler is up your alley! Just like the regular Grappler, shoot its suction cup to fling yourself to a solid surface, but here‚Äôs the chilly twist: as you begin flying in the air, the Icy Grappler‚Äôs frostiness will freeze your feet, causing you to stay moving when you get to your destination.

How‚Äôs this slipperiness advantageous? Evade your enemies‚Äô crosshairs as they have a hard time predicting where you‚Äôll end up next. Tip: Aim the Icy Grappler at a hill to make it your slide! 

The Icy Grappler is Exotic ‚Äî it can be exchanged for Bars from Fabio Sparklemane.


The Classic Grappler Comes Back

For those who do like to stick the landing, the regular Grappler has been unvaulted! You can find this classic variant from Chests and Supply Drops.


More Horde Rush

There are still Cube Monsters outside The Sideways!

The Horde Rush LTM and Quests are available past Fortnitemares. Jump in through November 9 at 9 AM ET.

Happy hunting!


 


Competitive notes:

  • The Icy Grappler and Grappler are not included in competitive playlists.
posts.description: The Icy Grappler deploys in the Nov. 2 hotfix for Fortnite Battle Royale v18.30. It acts like the Grappler ‚Äî but with a frozen twist. Read more!
posts.author: The Fortnite Team

posts.title: As Fast as a Turtle, Chapul√≠n Colorado Arrives in Fortnite!
posts.content:
UPDATE:


The Adventure Continues

Starting on November 1, become part of the best superhero gang by visiting Aventura Colorada, a player-made experience (made by community member Iscariote) based on Chapul√≠n Colorado‚Äôs sitcom.

Play and complete the minigames inspired by some iconic Chapul√≠n Colorado moments: use the Chipote Chill√≥n, run at full speed with your Antenitas de Vinil, and shrink yourself with the Pastillas de Chiquitolina to explore from a unique perspective!

You can join the adventure by selecting the experience in the Discover screen or by entering the code 6118-9838-7849 in the Island Code tab.

Having trouble? Check out our guide on how to use the Discover screen in Fortnite Creative.


Share your Appreciation for Chapul√≠n Colorado on TikTok

The Chapul√≠n Colorado nostalgia is taking over TikTok! Starting on November 1, join the Grasshopper Fever by sharing a tribute video under the hashtag #FNChapul√≠nColorado

Take a look at the amazing content being shared by other Fortnite creators and use them as inspiration to make your tribute video for this memorable occasion!
 


ORIGINAL POST:

Hold on to your seat! As you suspected from the beginning, on November 1 Chapul√≠n Colorado arrives in Fortnite to defend us all!

The world‚Äôs greatest comedic superhero on international TV is celebrating his 51st anniversary by joining the battle in Fortnite. First created by Roberto G√≥mez Bola√±os, Chapul√≠n Colorado carries himself as a superhero with a heart of gold. With his power to teleport, ability to detect danger with his antennae, and his super gadgets, he‚Äôs always ready to save us all. Chapul√≠n's clumsiness but with good intentions is what made him so loved in every household in Latin America and beyond.


¬°S√≠ganme los Buenos!

Chapul√≠n represents the everyday hero in all of us, and soon you can be that hero too with his unique item Set. So be ready to save the day! 



Starting 8 PM ET on November 1, players will be able to purchase bundles containing their favorite El Chapul√≠n Colorado Set items or purchase items separately.

In addition to the El Chapul√≠n Colorado Outfit, you can get the following Outfits: Agente Colorado, Capitana Colorada, Soldado Colorado, Amazona Colorada, Guerrero Colorado, Guerrera Colorada, H√©roe Colorado, Hero√≠na Colorada, Defensor Colorado, and Defensora Colorada.



Also, equip yourself with the Paralizatr√≥n CH-3000 Back Bling and brandish your always faithful Chipote Chill√≥n Pickaxe. 

And finally, celebrate your Victory Royale (or your tactical retreat) with the ¬°Que no panda el c√∫nico! Emote.

Antennae of your own await.
posts.description: The world‚Äôs greatest comedic superhero on international TV is joining the battle in Fortnite! Starting 8 PM ET on November 1, players will be able to purchase his Outfit and more items from his Set.
posts.author: The Fortnite Team

posts.title: Halloween Item Shop Fiends & Creatures in Fortnitemares‚Äô Fortune (2021)
posts.content:
Many new and returning Outfits are in store for Fortnitemares 2021, including storied monsters making their Fortnite debut. Classic Fortnite characters with new Halloween twists are creeping in also.

Keep checking back here to find out these new and returning Halloween Outfits haunting the Item Shop this October. A fortune card will flip over with each arrival, while the backs of the remaining cards will hint at who‚Äôs next‚Ä¶
 


Week 4 (October 26 - 29)



Week 4 ‚Äî the final week of the fortune cards ‚Äî is upon us. As usual, there‚Äôs no pattern as to when they‚Äôll turn over, but try using the hints to unearth what‚Äôs underneath.
 

  • Update (October 29 at 8 PM ET): The final iconic monster to make their Fortnite debut this month, Frankenstein‚Äôs Bride joins the legendary Universal Monsters! The Bride enters the battle reanimated and reimagined. Conquer the Island hooded with this Outfit‚Äôs casual Chilly Style.

    And those are all the cards on the page! Thank you for following along with us this month, and enjoy the rest of Fortnitemares 2021.
     

  • Update (October 28 at 8 PM ET): The star of Fortnitemares 2020, Shadow Midas is serving vengeance yet again in Fortnitemares 2021. Yes, Shadow Midas is now available as an Outfit! This Outfit‚Äôs reactive: his shadow effect grows with eliminations. He also possesses the Shadow Touch ability: apply a shadow Wrap to any equipped weapon.

    One card remains this week‚Ä¶ the final card to be flipped in Fortnitemares 2021!
     

  • Update (October 26 at 8 PM ET): You may have made your own superheroes with the Boundless Set, but now you can make your own zombie force with the Fallen Heroes Set. This Set includes ten zombie superhero Outfits you can customize!

    Two cards remain this week.
     


Week 3 (October 19 - 25)



Week 3 is here with five cards to be flipped. There‚Äôs no pattern as to when they‚Äôll turn over, but try using the hints to unwrap what they‚Äôll let slip.
 

  • Update (October 24 at 8 PM ET): Perhaps due to an incident at the Oakwitch Academy, the community-inspired Isabelle has turned into a zombie. Craving brains, Grisabelle is now on the haunt. Switch to this Outfit‚Äôs Cotton Candy alt Style to appear pink, blue, and slightly less unsettling.

    That‚Äôs all the cards for this week. Check back on October 26 for a new row of cards!
     

  • Update (October 22 at 8 PM ET): Two cards flip at once! As previously announced, The Mummy from the new Universal Monsters Set enters the battle this Fortnitemares. Like Frankenstein‚Äôs Monster, The Mummy Outfit comes with a Vintage alt Style.

    Arising alongside The Mummy is Graven, brooding master of the dark tomb. The decorative wings on top of this sarcophagus-fused Outfit can be taken on or off in the Locker.

    One card remains this week.
     

  • Update (October 21 at 8 PM ET): You may have helped Spacefarer Ariana Grande hunt monsters in her Monster Hunter Questline. Now you can hunt monsters AS Spacefarer Ariana Grande. For Fortnitemares, owners of the Outfit who complete her Questline before Fortnitemares ends (November 2) will unlock the Captain A. Grande Style. (The Style will be unlocked for all Outfit owners at the end of Chapter 2 Season 8.)

    Three cards remain this week.
     

  • Update (October 19 at 8 PM ET): Crimson is in: lover of the night Sanctum awakens with the new Crimson Sanctum alt Style. Be armored in red while bestilling your beating heart.

    Four cards remain this week.
     


Week 2 (October 12 - 18)



Week 2 is packed with new cards for the flipping ‚Äî six in fact. Like last time, there‚Äôs no pattern as to when they‚Äôll flip over, but try using the hints to chew on what they‚Äôll show.
 

  • Update (October 18 at 8 PM ET): After falling into darkness, only the Driftwalker remains. Corruption is taking over and the Graveyard Drift begins! Complete Quests to earn V-Bucks with the Graveyard Drift Quest Pack. Includes the Driftwalker Outfit (with alt Styles), a Back Bling, Pickaxe, and Glider.

    That‚Äôs all the cards for this week. Check back on October 19 for a new row of cards!
     

  • Update (October 17 at 8 PM ET): KAWS comes to Fortnite, in skeleton form for Fortnitemares! Go all bones with KAWS Skeleton in orange, green, pink, and bone-color Styles.

    One card remains this week.
     

  • Update (October 15 at 8 PM ET): A sweet surprise, Gummy Fishstick makes a splash in the candy basket. This new Outfit is in the Delicious Fishes Set, which includes a gummy Back Bling of multiple fish shapes and flavors! (And a Wrap and Pickaxe too!)

    Two cards remain this week.
     

  • Update (October 14 at 8 PM ET): The most reliable way to dress up for Halloween? Masks! With All-Hallow's Steve and Tricksy, choose a mask representing Fortnite stars like Fishstick, Meowscles, Wild Card, and more. When you include the different looks for their cloaks, there are over 10,000 Style combinations for each Outfit!

    Three cards remain this week.
     

  • Update (October 13 at 8 PM ET): Skeleton enthusiasts Skull Trooper and Skull Ranger have made a return! This time, they return with new, golden alt Styles: Gilded Skull Trooper and Gilded Skull Ranger!

    Four cards remain this week.
     

  • Update (October 12 at 8 PM ET): If Big Mouth didn‚Äôt seem full of toxins before, he definitely does now. Seeking victory, breath mints, and souls, Big Mouth returns with his new alt Style Poisonous Big Mouth.

    Five cards remain this week.
     


Week 1 (October 5 - 11)



Four cards are... in the cards for Week 1. As you can see, the card for Frankenstein‚Äôs Monster is already flipped over! Frankenstein‚Äôs Monster, which includes the Vintage Frank alt Style, will be available in the Item Shop on October 5 at 8 PM ET.

There‚Äôs no pattern as to when the rest will flip over, but try using the hints to sew what they‚Äôll reveal.
 

  • Update (October 9 at 8 PM ET): After Daryl Dixon and Michonne ‚Äújoined the hunt‚Äù in Chapter 2 Season 5, Rick Grimes has arrived to fight back the Cube Monsters in Fortnitemares 2021. Comes with the jacketed Winter Rick Grimes Style. (Oh, and Daryl and Michonne have returned to lend him a hand!)

    That‚Äôs all the cards for this week. Check back on October 12 for a new row of cards!
     

  • Update (October 7 at 8 PM ET): For Fortnitemares 2021, Renegade Raider is dressed as the neon blue skeleton Skeletara. This new Outfit‚Äôs irradiated and ready for battle!

    One card remains this week.
     

  • Update (October 5 at 8 PM ET): Another card has flipped for October 5! Sauntering in alongside Frankenstein‚Äôs Monster is Curdle Scream Leader, a new addition to the ‚ÄúTeam Leader‚Äù line-up.

    Two cards remain this week.


¬© Universal City Studios LLC
posts.description: Storied monsters, and Fortnite characters with Halloween twists, are haunting the Item Shop in Fortnitemares. Use the hints to predict who‚Äôs next...
posts.author: The Fortnite Team
